links.title: Chinese Electric-Car Startup NIO Prices Debut Model at $67,783
links.description: Chinese electric-car maker NIO has launched sales of its first vehicle three years after the company was founded, undercutting the price of a rival model from Tesla Inc. Chinese customers can buy the ES8 sports utility vehicle, with a range of 500 kilometers (311 miles) on a single charge, for 448,000 yuan ($67,783), the company said late Saturday in Beijing.

links.title: Flush with momentum, GOP speeds toward tax votes
links.description: Two high-profile Senate GOP holdouts - of Tennessee and of Florida - flipped from no to yes on the tax bill Friday afternoon, all but guaranteeing that Majority Leader (R-Ky.) will have the 51 votes needed to pass the legislation in the upper chamber.

messages.body: $TSLA Over $40M in truck sales now preordered (last count is at 285) https://www.bizjournals.com/dallas/news/2017/12/15/frito-lay-parent-orders-100-of-teslas-electric.html

links.title: Frito-Lay parent orders 100 Tesla electric semi trucks - Dallas Business Journal
links.description: The parent company of Plano-based Frito-Lay plans to send snack foods trucking on gas-free vehicles. PepsiCo Inc. (NYSE: PEP) has reserved 100 of Tesla Inc.'s (Nasdaq: TSLA) electric semi trucks, the largest known order of the automaker's new vehicle, Reuters reported. They will join the company's current fleet of 10,000 semis.
